task.summary: Three libraries added. META-INF mp3agic javazoom
A file is only added if it has .mp3 extension. writes song addresses to a text file.
Graphical changes made. MusicSliderBar modified. (a text area as added to show time.)

Graphical changes were made. TextArea to show time in MusicSliderBar had its text size changed and was set visible with showing 00:00 at first it can also be invisible at first and set visible when the song begins.
Slider bar moves with the song when it is played and stops when paused.
Logical changes. Player class created. changes in actionListeners.
PlaySong class modified(playInMiddle method added) ScrollSliderChanger class modified.
PlayerManager class made and somehow implemented.
PlayerManager class made and somehow implemented.
Bug fixed. problem in slider in specific cases.
Can now read saved songs from binary file. Can also write in it. well, Probably.

Can read Binary files. Can also write in them. well,
Probably?

Probably?

Sign in and sign up frame.
Bug fixed. line 16 in SignInOrSignOut (set holyFlag when closing)
Slider doesnt need dragging and moves with click. (TODO: make sure every thing still works!!)
Saves last listened song and also can show it's time with lastModified() called on the saving file.
